features: 【4-IN-1 Folding Exercise Bike for Home Workout】Sportneer Fitness Bike gives you three types of indoor exercise bikes: Upright, Semi-recumbent and Recumbent foldable home workout bike. Additionally, this bike comes with arm resistance bands to help tone your upper muscles and provide a complete body workout.

【Super Quiet】Sportneer indoor slim cycle exercise bike takes safety seriously! 5.5lb quiet flywheel and PVC floor mat provide stabilization of your training equipment, keeping your movements smooth and quiet while protecting your floor for you to ride freely.

【16 Magnetic Resistance Levels】The 16 magnetic resistance levels of the Stationary Exercise Bike is the star of the show. These resistance levels allow for the customization of your exercise plan, ranging from warm-up to strenuous training. The 7 adjustable heights and 240lbs weight support mean that you can ramp up your workout.

【Comfortable & Easy To Assemble】Sportneer exercise bikes for home comes equipped with a backrest and an ergonomic saddle expertly crafted from a high-density sponge for extra comfort and very easy to assemble. (Please note: If you meet problems when using the product, please feel free to consult us, we will do our best and be glad to help you solve any problems.)

【Compact Design & Easy to Move】The folding exercise bike is extremely suitable for the small living room because it doesn't take up too much space. And it can be fully folded up to occupy minimal space for storage when not in use. It comes with transport wheels for you to move this exercise bike easily from room to room in your home gym.

【LCD Monitor with iPad Holder】The Sportneer 4-in-1 Folding Stationary Bike is for you as it lets you know your speed, time, distance, calories expended, and heart rates during your workout sessions. A tablet device holder attached makes watching video on your iPad or phone available while exercising.

【Great Value Gift for Seniors, Parents】Compared with exercise bikes, Sportneer X-Bike is the more suitable gift for parents' health. It has more adjustments, less noise, takes up less space, simpler installation methods, more portable folding storage functions, and a more stable support structure. Ideal for physical therapy and calorie burning of men, women and seniors.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Start Pedaling to A Slimmer with Sportneer New Version 3 in 1 Resistance Exercise Bike! No more complaints about rainy days and slippery floors! You can now take the velodrome into your living room with the Sportneer Indoor Exercise Bike! Equipped with an ergonomic saddle, backrest, PVC mat, digital monitor, and pulse sensor, this training bike allows for an unparalleled safe, stable, and comfortable riding experience. Get ready to enjoy a quiet bike training experience with the featured noise reduction flywheel on the wheels of this training bicycle. It doesn’t matter how hard you pedal, you can expect ZERO WOBBLE! Are you training for the trail? The Sportneer Foldable Stationary Bike includes 16 magnetic resistance settings to help you simulate even the toughest ride. Ride with passion and let the training bike do the rest! Please note: If you meet problems when using the product, please feel free to consult us, we will do our best and be glad to help you solve any problems.
Folding Indoor Cycling Bike with PVC Floor Mat--Quiet Enjoyment of Fitness

3 In 1 Compact Exercise Bike Feature Digital Monitor & Pulse Sensor Optimized for real-time sports data tracking. Discover your time, speed, distance, calories, and heart rate. 16 Magnetic Resistance Levels Customize your training easily with 16 adjustable resistance levels of the foldable stationary bike. Tablet & Phone Holder Your exercise videos and favorite programs stay within reach with the tablet/phone holder on this training bike. Resistant Band Your arms, shoulders, and waist stay relaxed while training with the built-in resistance band.

Comfortable Seat with Backrest The ergonomic seat with a backrest and high-density foam provides the best cushion. Choose the ideal height for your exercise with the 7-height adjustment. 3-in-1 Framework The triangular structure allows for 240lbs of weight support and safe and stable operation. The 3 gear adjustments on the indoor bike allow for easy folding and unfolding. Professional & Adjustable Pedals Secure your feet in place with the included soft shoelaces and non-slip pedals for a secured training session. Train with zero worries! Built-in Wheels The convenient transport wheels allow for easy transportation and storage of the exercise bike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was going to Physical Therapy 3X a week at $25./day copay. The exercise bicycles there were old and barely serviceable. That was most of my therapy. So I ordered this and next day the box was at my door. So easy to put together and it comes with a foam mat and arm/shoulder exercise pulls. Clean, classy, comfortable and I can do it at home. Nicer than any of the bikes at PT too. Love it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent & quiet foldable bike for my small space!
reviews.reviewText: I received this bike after a great deal of research and am so happy I made this purchase. It was packaged well and protected. I have a small space and live on the 3rd floor of an apartment building. When I’m not using it, I fold it up and put it next to my refrigerator. It takes a small amount of space. Also, it is not hard at all to assemble when you read the instructions. It is easy to move with the wheels on it - love that feature. When I’m using it, it is so quiet - I’m not bothering my neighbor below - another great feature. As an added bonus the bike came with a nice mat. I wanted a fitness machine that I could pull out easily for 10 to 15 minute breaks in my kitchen. I really like resistance bands which I use to get two workouts at one time. I feel energized and ready to jump back into work. I like that you adjust this bike seat too. This is a win win for me. I’m so glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bike arrived on time and was packaged very well. All the parts were wrapped and well protected. Assembly was straight forward and easy for one person. Tools are included for your assembly. Took about 25 minutes from unboxing to fully assembly. Very sturdy, display large and clear. The display also has an area to hold your phone or IPad. Adjustments are easy to access and make. The best part, super quiet. Practically silent. The exercise pad it comes with really helps to stop slips and protects your flooring. Great bike and portable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR
reviews.reviewText: I picked this product because I wanted a recumbent exercise bike in my home that did not take up much room. I read some reviews and this product said that the mfgr was responsive to issues (I did not have any) and because it had the grips with bands to strengthen arm and back muscles. The bike feels stable, the seat is adjustable, it has 2 positions (recumbent and regular) plus storage to not take up much room, and a vinyl mat for the floor. To assemble all the bolts and washers were already in the right holes, so you just unscrew them, put the piece in place and put the bolt back in. No digging through a bag and trying to identify what size goes where. The open-end wrench and the allen wrench were like regular tools (not miniature or flat) and easy to use. I was impressed. It is quiet. It is easy to adjust the difficulty while riding. The seat needs some breaking in, and the back is difficult to get tightened enough so it stays more erect (it leans back slightly more than I like) but the quality overall is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this turned out be the best birthday present i ever bought for my self (79) ! its so well engineered , sturdy and smooth and quiet. and the manuel ! wow ! never have seen better written manuel i put it together in one afternoon. thanks people. you made a fine indoor bike at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: The bike works, but is very cheaply made. The directions say to clear the info from the screen to hold down button for several seconds. It did not work with mine. I had to remove the batteries to reset the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Workout at Low Cost
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, well-made, great for seniors & kids. The control panel is a plus. The price is right!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Assembles nicely, rolls nicely, folds and stores nicely. Pedal bands difficult to get snapped on (using mine without those now). I find it difficult to get on and off bike. I am 5' 5", and seat is lowered, but use a step stool to get on and off bike safely... feel like more space is needed between seat and handlebars to get on and off safely. (Is there a trick I'm missing?) Functions well... like the upper body workout straps and feel I get a good workout.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ein sehr guter Heimtrainer, hat unsere Erwartungen übertroffen
reviews.reviewText: Meine Frau und ich, wir sind beide über 80 Jahre alt. Wir hatte für unsere Fitness uns schon ein Laufband zu gelegt, der Fahrrad-Heimtrainer ist eine wertvolle Ergänzung.Mit ein wenig handwerklichem Geschick ist er schnell zusammen gebaut und aufgestellt. Die Qualität der einzelnen Komponenten, wie Schrauben, Muttern, etc. sind von hohem Sicherheitsanspruch. Das Gerät selber ist sehr leise im Betrieb und braucht auch keinen externen Stromanschluss.Die eingebauten Expander- Bänder für die Armmuskulatur geben dem Ganzen noch eine zusätzliche Plusbewertung.... Wir sind begeistert von dem Gerät und hoffen es noch lange nutzen zu können

Das Gerät wurde schnell und sicher verpackt zugestellt, der Aufbau ging schnell und klappt auch allein. Der Stand ist in allen Positionen sicher und die Einzelteile machen einen robusten Eindruck. Bei Nutzung ist das Schwungrad sehr leise, lediglich der Displaytöne (Start, Reset, ...) ist ziemlich laut und schrill, dauert aber nur wenige Sekunden an. Der Widerstand lässt sich mühelos und graduell einstellen. Das Display zeigt u. a. Zeit, gefahrene Kilometer, Kalorienverbrauch und Herzschlagrate an. Der Sitz hat eine schöne breite Fläche, ist aber relativ hart. Um dem abzuhelfen, habe ich um das empfohlene (und separat zu bestellende) Sitzpolster erweitert. Nach mehrwöchiger, täglicher Benutzung sind keine Verschleißerscheinungen ersichtlich und das Fahren macht weiterhin großen Spaß.

Der Heimtrainer läßt sich leicht zusammenbauen. Allerdings sollte man zu 2 sein. Er ist stabil (ich wiege 130kg). Leider ist bei der Qualitätskontrolle nicht aufgefallen, daß die Bohrung (Gewinde) vom linken Pedal defekt ist und sich das Pedal nicht einschrauben läßt. Ich bekam sehr nette Beschreibungen wie ich das defekte Pedal einzuschrauben habe. Leider war es weder dem Verkäufer noch der Herstellerfirma möglich mir ein passendes Pedal zuzuschicken. So mußte ich (ohne Auto) das schwere Teil zurückschicken.

Die Optik sowie auch Funktionalität sind perfekt. Es nimmt nicht viel Platz und kann durch die Klappfuktion gut verstaut werden. Der Aufbau war sehr einfach. Bei der ersten Lieferung gab es ein Defekt am Heimtrainer, somit wurde der Verkäufer kontaktier. Dieser antwortet rasch und schickte direkt ein neuen Heimtrainer zu. Dass nenne ich mal Service. Ich bin sehr Zufrieden und kann dass Produkt zu 100 % weiter empfehlen!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewerName: Extrem schlechte Qualität. Habe ihn 2x benutzt und jetzt gerade , als ich ihn das 3. Mal nutzen wollte, ist das ein Teil des Pedals abgebrochen . So, dass man das linke Pedal nicht mehr befestigen konnte! Ich weiß nicht von wo, aber ein kleiner Teil ist abgebrochen / heraus gebrochen. Ich ärgere mich aber - absoluter Fehlkauf und NICHT empfehlenswert !!! Extrem schlechte Qualität. Habe ihn 2x benutzt und jetzt gerade , als ich ihn das 3. Mal nutzen wollte, ist das ein Teil des Pedals abgebrochen . So, dass man das linke Pedal nicht mehr befestigen konnte! Ich weiß nicht von wo, aber ein kleiner Teil ist abgebrochen / heraus gebrochen. Ich ärgere mich aber - absoluter Fehlkauf und NICHT empfehlenswert !!!
reviews.reviewText: Extrem schlechte Qualität. Pedal abgebrochen und nicht mehr möglich zu befestigen, nicht mehr reparabel. 2x benutzt, ab dem 3. Mal kaputt. Nicht kaufen - extrem schlechte Qualität!!!!!
